titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duties on cefuroxime axetil (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9553-9554)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1-(acetyloxy) ethyl ester of (6R, 7R)-3-carbamoyl-oxymethyl- 7-(Z-2-methoxyimino-2-(fur-2-yl) acetamido) ceph-3-em-4-carboxylate (cefuroxime axetil in bulk and dosage forms).
